sourcesContent:
import {makeStyles} from "@material-ui/core/styles"

export const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({
    root: {
        background: '#33cc99',
        color: '#fff',
        fontFamily: 'Open Sans sans-serif',
        maxHeight: 700,
        overflow: 'hidden',
    },

    c: {
        textAlign: 'center',
        display: 'block',
        position: 'relative',
        width: '80%',
        margin: '100px auto',
    },


    _404: {
        fontSize: 220,
        position: 'relative',
        display: 'inline-block',
        zIndex: 2,
        height: 250,
        letterSpacing: 15,
    },
    _1: {
        textAlign: 'center',
        display: 'block',
        position: 'relative',
        letterSpacing: 12,
        fontSize: '4em',
        lineHeight: '80%',
    },
    _2: {
        textAlign: 'center',
        display: 'block',
        position: 'relative',
        fontSize: 20,
    },
    text: {
        fontSize: 70,
        textAlign: 'center',
        position: 'relative',
        display: 'inline-block',
        margin: '19px 0px 0px 0px',
        /* top: 256.301px, */
        zIndex: 3,
        width: '100%',
        lineHeight: '1.2em',
    },


    btn: {
        backgroundColor: 'rgb( 255, 255, 255 )',
        position: 'relative',
        display: 'inline-block',
        width: 358,
        padding: 5,
        zIndex: 5,
        fontSize: 25,
        margin: '0 auto',
        color: '#33cc99',
        textDecoration: 'none',
        marginRight: 10
    },
    right: {
        float: 'right',
        width: '60%',
    },

    hr: {
        padding: 0,
        border: 'none',
        borderTop: '5px solid #fff',
        color: '#fff',
        textAlign: 'center',
        margin: '0px auto',
        width: 420,
        height: 10,
        zIndex: -10,

        '&:after': {
            content: '2022',
            display: 'inline-block',
            position: 'relative',
            top: '-0.75em',
            fontSize: '2em',
            padding: '0 0.2em',
            background: '#33cc99',
        },
    },


}))
